item.title: New York Mayor Eric Adams refuses to drop out of race after Trump nomination floated
item.description: President Trump has said he wants two candidates to drop out of the New York mayor's race to clear the way to beat Democratic nominee Zohran Mamdani.

item.title: Mystery of former Federal Reserve Governor Kugler's resignation deepens as real estate records raise new questions
item.description: The mystery surrounding former Federal Reserve Governor Adriana Kugler's resignation has gained new urgency.
